original_text: Now look at this woman. She belongs to the family of Abraham. But a bad spirit from the Devil has made her ill for 18 years. It is like he has tied her up. So it must be right to make her free on our day of rest.’
korean_text: 그러면 열여덟 해 동안 사탄에게 매인 바 된 이 아브라함의 딸을 안식일에 이 매임에서 푸는 것이 합당하지 아니하냐

sentences.original_text: She belongs to the family of Abraham.
But a bad spirit from the Devil has made her ill for 18 years.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 악마로부터 온 나쁜 영이 그녀를 18년 동안 아프게 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: It is like he has tied her up.
So it must be right to make her free on our day of rest.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 우리의 안식일에 그녀를 자유롭게 하는 것이 옳을 것입니다.
